name: Uliana Sirotina
about: I lead engineering teams that care about purposeful work, empathy, and clarity. My background in front-end development helps me bridge product, design, and engineering — creating environments where people and products grow together.
now: Currently leading a cross-functional team at SoSafe SE and continuing to explore accessibility, process improvement, and sustainable team culture.

highlights.title: SoSafe SE — Engineering Team Lead (2024–present)
highlights.summary: Leading a cross-functional team and partnering with Product and Design to align roadmap and priorities with company values. Implemented accessibility guardrails and monitoring across key products.

highlights.title: Garden.io GmbH — Senior Frontend Engineer (2023–2024)
highlights.summary: Developed product features using React, TypeScript, and React-Query. Contributed to API improvements and internal tooling.

highlights.title: Adjust GmbH — Senior Frontend Engineer (2022–2023)
highlights.summary: Improved team processes and code reliability by introducing structured API error handling, separate monitoring flows, and a clear bug-tracking system.

highlights.title: Uberall GmbH — Engineering Manager & Squad Lead (2020–2022)
highlights.summary: Managed a team of six engineers, introduced Scrum, coached team members, and built a culture of constructive feedback, transparency, and cross-functional collaboration.

highlights.title: Trail — Freelance Frontend Engineer (2023–2024)
highlights.summary: Developed front-end features with React, TypeScript, and GraphQL (Apollo). Helped improve product structure and maintainability for a small startup team.

highlights.title: Mentor Move — Career & Relocation Mentor (2022)
highlights.summary: Supported professionals relocating to Europe by reviewing CVs, running mock interviews, and offering career coaching.
